Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class ChallengerWindow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.GameWindow
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.ChallengerWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ChallengerWindow
extends GameWindow
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
It is the window where the challenger can choose the gods he wants to play with. These gods will be sent to other players for being chosen

  • Field Details

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible
      It let the button nextButton to be visible or not

    • backGodButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button backGodButton
      It is the button to scroll backwards the gods

    • nextGodButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button nextGodButton
      It is the button to scroll forward the gods

    • godLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label godLabel
      It shows god's name. It changes when the current god on screen changes.

    • powerLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label powerLabel
      It shows a short description of god's power.

    • playLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label playLabel
      It shows the message "PLAY!" on screen.

    • chooseButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button chooseButton
      It is the button to press to choose a god.

    • nextButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button nextButton
      This button gets visible if and only if the number of chosen gods is equal to the number of players. It let the player to change the window.

    • godCard

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView godCard
      It is the image where the current god is shown. It changes by pressing nextGodButton and backGodButton.

    • chooseButtonImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView chooseButtonImage
      It is the image of chooseButton.

    • playImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView playImage
      It is the image of nextButton.

    • backButtonImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView backButtonImage
      It is the image of backGodButton.

    • nextButtonImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView nextButtonImage
      It is the image of nextGodButton.

    • firstGodLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label firstGodLabel
      It shows the name of the first chosen god.

    • secondGodLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label secondGodLabel
      It shows the name of the second chosen god.

    • thirdGodLabel

      public javafx.scene.control.Label thirdGodLabel
      It shows the name of the third chosen god, if present.

    • challengerPane

      public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane challengerPane
      It is the pane of this window.

  • Method Details

    • backGod

      public void backGod​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      It changes the current god, rolling currGod back and loading a new image on godCard.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - generated by clicking on backGodButton.

    • nextGod

      public void nextGod​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      It changes the current god, rolling currGod on and loading a new image on godCard.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - generated by clicking on nextGodButton.

    • chooseGod

      public void chooseGod​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      It adds the chosen god to a list of already chosen gods. If the number of gods is equal to the number of players, it lets playImage, playLabel and nextButton be visible.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - generated by clicking on chooseButton.

    • goFurther

      public void goFurther​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      It changes the current scene and the current stage, closing the latter.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - generated by clicking on nextButton.

    • clickBack

      public void clickBack​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      It shows a graphical effect when pressing backGodButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by pressing backGodButton.

    • releaseBack

      public void releaseBack​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      It shows a graphical effect when releasing backGodButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by releasing backGodButton.

    • clickNext

      public void clickNext​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      It shows a graphical effect when pressing nextGodButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by pressing nextGodButton.

    • releaseNext

      public void releaseNext​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      It shows a graphical effect when releasing nextGodButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by releasing nextGodButton.

      It shows a graphical effect when pressing chooseButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by pressing chooseButton.

    • clickPlay

      public void clickPlay​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      It shows a graphical effect when pressing chooseButton.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - generated by pressing nextButton.
